body_html: Are your sure you are running the FakeQuant nodes after the weights. The weights will still retain their full precision but the output fo the following FakeQuant will emulate the correct quantization. So make sure for each weight you are actually checking the 'weight_quant/FakeQuantWithMinMaxVars' operation following it.

body: Are your sure you are running the FakeQuant nodes after the weights. The weights will still retain their full precision but the output fo the following FakeQuant will emulate the correct quantization. So make sure for each weight you are actually checking the 'weight_quant/FakeQuantWithMinMaxVars' operation following it.
